title: SoC THEATRE 241-1-20 Design Process: Scene Design I

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Intro to scenic design is a 10 week course applying the major principles of design to the physical stage. Students will learn the necessary skills, including but not limited to, analysis, storyboarding, model making, and hand drafting in order to develop a final scenic design for a play or musical.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Sophomore standing and permission of instructor.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Midterm and final examinations. Project work throughout. Attendance.

subject: THEATRE
